summary: The scion of a wealthy landowner family turns to alcohol and self-pity and slowly self-destructs after class differences force him to break off his relationship with his childhood sweetheart.
cast: Dilip Kumar|Suchitra Sen|Vyjayanthimala|Motilal|Nasir Hussain|Murad|Kanhaiyalal Chaturvedi|Moni Chatterjee|Iftekhar|Shivraj|Nana Palsikar|Ashim Kumar|Ram Kumar|Vikram Kapoor|Ved|Shivji Bhai|Mohan Choti|Kumari Naaz|Pratima Devi|Kammo|Sarita Devi|Shakuntala|Dulari|Kamal|Kamala Mukherjee|Praveen Paul|Maya Dass|Nazima|Pran|Johnny Walker
title: Devdas
